responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "07FBB86B45F520BD9A0135BBDCB569DF", "In the firepits, that shimmering essence? I have found it at other minotaur sites. I believe it to be the remnant of magically reduced glint. The Streamweavers, shamans of the Ashen Flame have found some way to render the essence from glint and utilize the magics therein. This is an ill omen if true!")
name: SQ_30_FAS_Intro_26
